\documentclass{article}

\usepackage{sagetex}

\begin{document}

\begin{sageblock}
  f(x) = cos(x) * exp(x)
\end{sageblock}

The second derivative of $f$ is

\[
  \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2}}{\mathrm{d}x^{2}} \left[ \sage{f(x)} \right] =
  \sage{diff(f, x, 2)(x)}.
\]

Here is a plot of $f$

\sageplot[width=.75\textwidth]{plot(f, -4, 2)}

\end{document}
